# Overview
How to save as ASCii grid for SAGA topographic processing. This is updated to use the new `terra` package, which relies on `gdalUtilities` and `sf` package.

# Packages 

```{r}
library(terra)
library(gdalUtilities)
library(sf)
```

# DEM Data
```{r}
x <- rast("../data/DEMFieldAK/N62W142_FABDEM_V1-0.tif")
```

```{r}
x
```

# Save DEM as ASCii file
```{r}
writeRaster(x, filename = "../outputs/dem1.asc", datatype = "INT2U", filetype = "AAIGrid", overwrite=TRUE)
```

# Read it back in and take a look
```{r}
dem <- rast("../outputs/dem1.asc")
```

```{r}
dem
```
